entities.name: professor binns
entities.description: Professor Binns is described as someone that Hermione is gazing at with her eyes out of focus.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as the one who called Professor Moody's name and approached him in the corridor.

entities.name: professor moody
entities.description: Professor Moody is described as someone who looked tired, with his normal eye drooping and his magical eye following a couple of passing students.

relationships.description: Harry Potter approached Professor Moody in the corridor, calling his name as they made their way through the crowd.
Professor Moody greeted Harry Potter with a growl, acknowledging him by name.
